item1.question: What if AI misclassifies a complaint?
item1.answer: Staff can manually change categories and assignees anytime. Modified data is reflected in AI training for continuous accuracy improvement.

item2.question: Can it integrate with existing systems?
item2.answer: Yes, integration is possible through APIs. Customization support is also available when needed.

item3.question: Is personal data secure?
item3.answer: All data is encrypted and stored with ISO 27001 certified security systems. On-premises installation is also available.

item4.question: How is training conducted after implementation?
item4.answer: Our dedicated support team assists the entire process from initial setup to staff training. Online training materials and real-time support are provided.

item5.question: What if Kakao AlimTalk approval takes long?
item5.answer: SMS is immediately available as a backup channel. Notifications are sent via SMS until Kakao approval, then automatically switched.

item6.question: What happens to data if we don't contract after pilot?
item6.answer: All data from the pilot period is provided as an Excel file. 100% data ownership belongs to the institution.
